DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - Compare overall survival treatment paclitaxel , carboplatin , etoposide treatment fluorouracil leucovorin calcium patient adenocarcinoma unknown primary . - Compare response rate , progression free survival , toxicity profile , quality life two regimens patient . OUTLINE : This randomize , multicenter study . Patients stratify center presence absence liver metastasis . Patients randomly assign one two treatment arm . - Arm I : Patients receive paclitaxel IV 1 hour carboplatin IV 30 minute day 1 , oral etoposide day 1-10 . Treatment repeat every 3 week four course . - Arm II : Patients receive leucovorin calcium IV 2 hour follow fluorouracil IV 24 hour weekly 6 week . Treatment repeat every 7 week two course . Patients follow every 3 month treatment 1 year death . Quality life questionnaire complete follow-up . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : Approximately 120-140 patient accrue study within 3 year .
